page.title: 02CLAWTON SCHOOL
page.content: My school is{Clawton}and I have been to it for 5 years. The school in {1985}has{44}children.The school opened in{1876.}My dad used to come here and so did my grandad.In{1985}there is one {junior}class,one {infant}class, a {hall,}a {staff room,}two blocks of girls and boys toilets, two play grounds one field and a kitchen. { {Clawton Play group }meet in the school hall two days a week(Tuesday mornings and Thursday afternoons.) The school cooks its own dinners.As in 1876 there was only an{infant}class and a{junior class though it did cook its own dinners}even then.
